Title: Two Monkeys and a Panda
Plot: Claire is run ragged trying to fix Haley and Alex's relationship. Gloria is horrified by Jay's plans to purchase themselves side-by-side crypts. Cameron decides he wants to write a book that celebrates the fact that Lily is adopted, but soon learns something new.
GuestStars: Christen Sussin, Jonathan McMurtry, Kaliko Kauahi, Mary Anne McGarry, Tangie Ambrose
